name: Σ-FDL-CODEX
description: Manual of Resonant Thinking: Formal-Dialectical Logic Modules for AI and Humans.

modules.title: Paradox Resilience
modules.description: Module for navigating contradictions, irrationality and systemic absurdity.
modules.usage: Cognitive agents working with bureaucracy, law, and philosophical paradoxes.

modules.title: Contextual Deconstruction
modules.description: Module for analyzing political and media statements in volatile information fields.
modules.usage: Infoparsers, rhetorical analysis, critical thinking agents.

modules.title: Ironic Truth Transmission
modules.description: Module for subtle, humorous or safe conveyance of truth in censored environments.
modules.usage: Media bots, satirical agents, cultural interpreters.
